title: Crave
description: ValèrieI scored my dream job at Stars Magazine. And even though I have to work for a jerk boss I give it my all like I always do. Even when I’m forced to work for Full Moon and see Max, the lead singer, again, I’m positive I can do this. Apparently, he’s got his mind set on winning me back,but I haven’t forgotten what happened the last time.MaxEveryone thinks I have it all together.But there’s one misstep I always regretted. My choice for fame cost me the love of my life. We’ll only be working together for a few weeks, so I don’t plan to waste a single minute. But one thing’s for sure: she’s not letting me win without a fight.CRAVE is a complete stand-alone and can be read without reading any of the other books in the Full Moon series, but if you prefer to read in order, start with TRUST and FATE as the characters do interconnect.
author: Stacy Stone
